source.sqlReaderQuery: select max(TrxnDate) as SourceTbl_Max_Date from DBO.Iftable_Source
select max(TrxnDate) as DestTbl_Max_Date from DBO.Iftable_Dest

select Name, Address, City, Country from 
DBO.address_common where Country =
'India'

select * from address_common where 
country not in ('India', 'Usa')
